name: The Great Maze Escape
description:
This game was created as part of the final assignment for my Unity Junior Programmer class. You can see my completion badge on Credly.

Controls:

Movement: WASD

Look: Mouse

Flashlight: F

You use your flashlight to navigate a maze filled with enemies out for your blood! Avoid them and find the exit! You can collect shards that match the color of the enemy to destroy them.

The enemies won't follow you if your flashlight is off.

You can see the GitHub repo for this project here.
